common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this API to retrieve the current status and result of a video upload task. You can also use video_upload_result_push to get notified immediately when a video upload reaches a final status (SUCCEEDED, FAILED, or CANCELLED).
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The unique ID of the upload task, returned by v2.media.init_video_upload.

","name":"video_upload_id","sample":"sg-11110201-6kh48-mepm7a0ttcw3c3","type":"string","required":"True","key":"JyJJsDt"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"HJsDEHh"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nmatpab"},{"description":"

Indicate warning message you should take care.

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jdMEdc"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f33ee88a7454c64e7a0b546e01","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GzcZTxH"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"Jpchmza","children":[{"description":"

Current status of the upload task. Possible values:

- INITIATED: Upload task has been created (via init_video_upload) but no parts have been uploaded yet.

- UPLOADING: Video file parts are being uploaded. The upload has started but is not yet completed.

- UPLOADED: All video parts have been uploaded successfully, waiting for complete_video_upload to trigger processing.

- PROCESSING: Video is being transcoded/validated by the system (duration, format, resolution checks).

- SUCCEEDED: Video upload and transcoding completed successfully. Video URL and cover URL are available for use.

- FAILED: Upload or processing failed (e.g., invalid format, duration not within allowed range, transcoding error).

- CANCELLED: Upload task was explicitly canceled by the client (cancel_video_upload), and the video is discarded.

","name":"status","sample":"SUCCEEDED","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nRenQHP"},{"description":"

Detailed fail or cancel reason, will be returned if status is FAILED or CANCELLED.

","name":"reason","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HiDBrTM"},{"description":"

The time of video status updates.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1758018336","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"RfeZGmR"},{"description":"

Transcoded video info, will be returned if status is SUCCEEDED.

","name":"video_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"cGtsRjf","children":[{"description":"

Video playback url.

","name":"video_url","sample":"http://play-src.vod.shopee.com/api/v4/11110201/mms/sg-11110201-6kh48-mepm7a0ttcw3c3.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nJxiZTk"},{"description":"

Video thumbnail image url.

","name":"video_thumbnail_url","sample":"http://img.sp.mms.shopee.sg/sg-11110201-6kh48-mepm7a0ttcw3c3_cover","type":"string","required":null,"key":"AbQxnB"},{"description":"

Video thumbnail image width.

","name":"thumbnail_width","sample":"1920","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"NtXSbea"},{"description":"

Video thumbnail image width.

","name":"thumbnail_height","sample":"1080","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"wDiTdjM"},{"description":"

Video duration in seconds.

","name":"duration","sample":"105","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"bBTMDCD"},{"description":"

Video resolution, e.g., \"1280x1280\".

","name":"resolution","sample":"960x540","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mhpTmpf"}]}]}]}
